properties.name: portal.security.jwt.refresh-token-exp-time
properties.description: {@link IPortalJwtToken} can be refreshed during this timeframe.

properties.name: portal.security.jwt.token-expiration-time
properties.description: {@link IPortalJwtToken} will expire after this time.

properties.name: portal.security.jwt.token-signing-key
properties.description: Key is used to sign {@link IPortalJwtToken}.
